fixes.name: Status Category
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Attendance+ (HR_Attendance_Dataset)'[Status] = "Present", "On Time",
    IF(
        'Attendance+ (HR_Attendance_Dataset)'[Status] = "Work From Home", "Remote",
        "Needs Attention"
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: This is a row-level classification that only references the [Status] column. Tableau IF/ELSEIF is implemented as nested IF in DAX, and all column references were converted to the 'TableName'[Column] format. No aggregation or parameters are present, so it is modeled as a calculated column.
